publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3724 Margaret Smith: Mental Health (Scotland) Bill - Order of Consideration at Stage 2—That the Health and Community Care Committee considers the Mental Health (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2 in the following order: section 227, sections 1 and 2, schedule 1, sections 3 to 18, schedule 2, sections 19 to 62, sections 64 and 65, section 63, sections 66 to 91, sections 161 to 212, sections 92 to 160, sections 213 to 226, sections 228 and 229, schedules 3 and 4, sections 230 and 231.

S1M-3724 Margaret Smith: Mental Health (Scotland) Bill - Order of Consideration at Stage 2—That the Health and Community Care Committee considers the Mental Health (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2 in the following order: section 227, sections 1 and 2, schedule 1, sections 3 to 18, schedule 2, sections 19 to 62, sections 64 and 65, section 63, sections 66 to 91, sections 161 to 212, sections 92 to 160, sections 213 to 226, sections 228 and 229, schedules 3 and 4, sections 230 and 231.
S1M-3724 Mental Health (Scotland) Bill - Order of Consideration at Stage 2 (lodged on 18 December 2002) Colin Campbell*
